Donald Trump and The Definition of Insanity
Shane Snow
1.2K160

So you’re suggesting that all politicians are insane?

I’m apprehensive of any medical professional who would psychoanalyze a ‘patiant’ based on random public appearances. The same way I wouldn’t trust a programmer who criticized a piece of software, without actually looking at the source code for that system. Quite frankly, it’s amateurish.

Most of Trump behavior were meant to sensationalize and draw attention and not necessarily a part of his character. A professional should recognize and understand this. Of course, this was mainly a political statement, rather than an actual concern over Trump administration.
